name: Proyect: Jellyfish
description:
Created by The Sandman Games

A new disease has appeared, can you find patient zero?

X = Open Menu , Cancel
Z = Prepare player to use Main Weapon
S = Prepare player to use Self Weapon
C = Use weapon (Shoot) , Enter
D = Dash

Z+C= Shoot

made with rpg maker and script ress

Iconos diseñados por Freepik from www.flaticon.es
